Package com.plutonian.plutonianProducts.controller

Class OrderItemsController

java.lang.Object
com.plutonian.plutonianProducts.controller.OrderItemsController
@CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/orderItems")
public class OrderItemsController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Steve Bentley Oder Items entity controller. This controller takes requests from the web server and queries the database. Logic should be handled in this class. All requests in this class begin with a "/orderItems" URL.

Please reference Programmers Manual - Detailed requirements for Requirements Tracing - 1.2.4.3, 1.5, 4.1.6, 4.1.7, 6.3-6, 7.1, 7.2.*, 7.3.*, 8.2

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderItemsController

      public OrderItemsController()

  • Method Details

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public java.util.Optional<OrderItems> getById​(@PathVariable int id)
      Queries the database for orderitems by their primary key ID. Handles GET requests from the server with URL parameters containing an integer for the id.
      Parameters:
      id - int primary key of an order item.
      Returns:
      Optional order item object if id is found.

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") public java.util.List<OrderItems> getAll()
      Queries database for all columns and rows in the OrderItems database. Handles GET request for /all. Response is in JSON form. Uses repository for actual QUERY statement.
      Returns:
      List of Order Items modeling database in JSON form.

    • newOrderItems

      @PostMapping("/new") public void newOrderItems​(@RequestBody OrderItems orderItems)
      Handles POST to /new URL for adding items to an Order. JSON is sent from server including the required attributes for Order Items. Items are added to an order. If an item sku is already present in an order than the quantity is changed so that multiple rows of the same item isn't associated with the same order.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - JSON of OrderItems attributes from POST.

    • getTypesByID

      @GetMapping("/order/{id}") public java.util.List<OrderItems> getTypesByID​(@PathVariable java.lang.String id)
      Returns items by their order id. Handles GET request for all items in an order. URL parameter is sent with order id. Queries with the repository which returns a list of order items in JSON form.
      Parameters:
      id - String of oder ID for order items to be returned.
      Returns:
      List of Order items in an order.
